concept-wr.title: Port-based DNAT Access for VMs
concept-wr.shortdesc: Titanium Server supports port-based DNAT, or port forwarding, for virtual routers on which SNAT is enabled.

conbody.p: US62989 section addedThis provides for externally initiated connections to multiple VMs using a single external IP address. For more information, see Titanium Server Tenant User's Guide: .
